entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:58 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
